page.title: 01LASTINGHAM,SPAUNTON,CROPTON.
page.content: This is an area of well maintained farmland,heather moorland,stone built villages & a large expanse of forestry. Mainly situated within the North Yorks Moors National Park,it caters well for tourism with fine walks & impressive scenery. The population consists of farming families,commutors,retired people & those who provide for the tourists. {Lastingham Village}has the highest proportion of retired people.{Spaunton is predominently a farming comunity and{Cropton}has many small buisnesses. Planning permission is under the control of the National Parks,who lay down specific regulations as regards building. {acreage population/child Lastingham. 2,322 88 15 Spaunton. 2,866 47 3 Cropton. 4,998 103 39
